get.description:
ListItems collides in name with the function in the other 'handlers' package.
The analyzer should generate a unique operationId for it.

ListItems returns a list of shared.Payload.
The schema for shared.Payload should be a $ref.

GetItem returns a single shared.Payload.
The schema for shared.Payload should also be a $ref, pointing to the same component.

ListItems has the same name as a handler in pkg1, but it's in a different package.
It should have a unique operationId.
